titleInfo.title: UDALL PARK LAND EXCHANGE COMPLETION ACT

extension.searchTitle: UDALL PARK LAND EXCHANGE COMPLETION ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 157

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Udall Park Land Exchange Completion Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1547, to provide for the unencumbering of title to non-Federal land owned by the city of Tucson, Arizona, for purposes of economic development by conveyance of the Federal reversionary interest to the City, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 401 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 544;

titleInfo.title: SAINT-GAUDENS NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK REDESIGNATION ACT

extension.searchTitle: SAINT-GAUDENS NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK REDESIGNATION ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 157

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 965, amended, to redesignate the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site as the ``Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park'', by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 401 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 545;
